link: Index entries for sequences that are permutations of the natural numbers
program: i = 0; for(n=1,oo,if(ispow2(isprimepower(n)), i++; v050376[i] = n); if(i == 2+up_to_e,break));
A053669(n) = forprime(p=2, , if (n % p, return(p))); \\ From A053669
